name: Painteraser
description:
This game is a sort of puzzle platformer with physics.

I made this game to generally try out new things with game development:
I tried using particles, I tried GameMaker Studio 2's built-in physics system, I made a level editor that can save and read, I tried composing better music, and I think I did a pretty good job.

However, I am terrible at designing puzzles - I made only a few for the game.
So if you decide to play it, I suggest you check out the level editor, as that's where most of the work went in. It's also probably the most complex thing I've ever coded.
(BTW, If you make anything with the level editor or find a crash in it, I'd love to know. Contact me using my Discord (Skirlez#5521) or Twitter (@skirlez3)).

As you could probably tell by the last level, I mostly rushed it at the end. I really just wanted to get the game out so I can move on, because I feared that I could just procrastinate forever.

I hope you have fun.
